website_summaries.verdict: The Canon PowerShot SD3500 IS offers up decent photos, touch-screen controls, and an ultrawide-angle lens, but that's pretty much where the excitement ends.

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner or advanced
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my parents to take on a cruise as a gift and they loved it! I've only ever purchased Canon cameras and won't shoot with anything else. When trying to find a camera that had all the features I'd want and the ease of learning for my parents, this was a no-brainer. While they aren't the most tech-savvy, figuring this camera out and all the options was an ease for them and they have enjoyed it ever since. I highly recommend this camera for not only beginners, but for advanced photographers wanting something pocket-sized instead of a DSLR as this can do so many of the same things.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Campbell

customer_reviews.title: SD3500IS Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking to replace my 2 year old camera, that has been with me around the world a couple of times with something new and exciting. After reading the reviews I decided to keep it, as there was really nothing wrong with it. It has all the features a traveler could use and it fits in my pocket ( a major factor). I have a few large chips 32GB, 16GB and some 8's that I fill up in Europe, Hawaii etc. what can I say I love it!![ [ASIN:B0035FZJIK Canon PowerShot SD3500IS 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 3.5-Inch Touch Panel LCD and 5x Ultra Wide Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom (Black)]]
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The I-camera
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this is the equivalent, in compact digital cameras, of a well-known and extremely popular cell phone. (It is, roughly, the same size). The touch screen is a pleasure to use. Now, my high end SLR is being relegated to very specific jobs that demand extremely high resolution and ultra wide angle lens. For the rest, and traveling, the SD3500IS, is the perfect companion. On top of that, the HD movies are very good, even though you can't zoom optically. Don't forget to leave the IS (Image stabilization) on all the time, specially for telephoto (80-120 mm) shots.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo R. Igonda

customer_reviews.title: Great little point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera far more than my expensive DSLR. Easy to carry, descent pictures with way more than enough control settings for the average person. My favorite feature though is the full length touch screen on the backside. This allows most of the controls to be performed by touch, but also allows a full camera size screen preview of a scene that my older eyes can see at arms length above my head for instance. Canon's settings screen are very intuitive and easy to navigate, much more so than the equivalent Nikon's. I have two, I liked it soo much.
customer_reviews.author: Ron E

customer_reviews.title: Canon power shot 14mg with 5 optical zoom
customer_reviews.text: I have always used Kodak products and will continue with my Kodak 14 mg/5 optical zoom, but I believe that Canon has better clarity and colored pictures. The night feature of the Canon is superior to any camera that I have ever used. When I travel, I will take both my Kodak and Canon cameras. The Kodak has excellent share capabilities and it is easy to manage my pictures on line. I like the rechargeable feature of the batteries on both cameras. The 5 optical zoom and motion features are outstanding on both cameras when shooting from the window of a bus or airplane. I purchased both cameras from Amazon and would suggest either camera.
customer_reviews.author: peace

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this camera. I have 2 small children so I wanted a small portable camera to take with me everywhere that can take great pictures of my crazy boys. This camera does it. I would love to have a DSLR for the shutter speed, but I can't afford one and they are too bulky for me. After a lot of research this one has a great shutter speed for such a small camera. It takes great pictures, I love the color accent feature. I am always getting compliments on the quality of the pictures I take. A great camera and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot 3500
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece of equipment especially for the traveler who wishes good results and convenience. I purchased another one for my spouse for the upcoming trip. Please be aware that the Operating System is incompatible with earlier versions of the Powershot line. I lost 1000 of my wife's pictures on the most recent trip trying to be economical with SD card space when I used the remainder of the card from my wife's Powershot 600 in my 3500. W. Stewart Tittle Klamath Falls, Oregon
customer_reviews.author: William S. Tittle

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for the person on the go.  !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the combo because of the tripod & the 8GB chip because its the best camera I've ever used for the user friendly options and the touch screen, also the 3.5" viewing dimensions that make it real nice when most Cameras are hard to see whats on the screen, the only negative thing would be the case that came with this combo, and it's too small for all the accessories you would like to keep with the camera ,like extra batteries, the charger and the tripod, Besides that ,!!! I'm totally satisfied and using this product almost daily ,I would recommend it above and beyond all other digital Cameras , ENJOY Jay Gugel, Gold river Calif.
customer_reviews.author: jay22gg

customer_reviews.title: I originally purchased this camera in June of 2013. ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this camera in June of 2013. I'm in the appraisal business and take a tremendous amount of pictures every month. This camera has stood the test of time. I'm buying another one of the same cameras after I finish this review.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Pink camera
customer_reviews.text: I really love the size of the camera and ease of use. I was a little disappointed in a self timed shot that did not appear focused properly. I couldn't go back and retake as it was a birthday shot and I barely got my boys to sit still anyway. The camera was on a stable object and so it should have focused great. Otherwise I love the camera. The video feature works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Little Pecan

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about it except the image quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera if you don't care about image quality. The touch screen is great. The camera is very small and compact. We love everything about it except the images it takes. We were trying to replace our 6 megapixel Olympus camera we bought several years ago. Unfortunately, even though this camera is 14 megapixels, the images from the Olympus look much better. It almost looks like the camera is compressing the image too much before storing it on the card. Fine details in the image like hair, grass, leaves, carpet, patterns in clothing, etc. end up just a blurred fuzzy splotch. We returned the camera for this reason and ended up ordering the Canon Powershot S95.
customer_reviews.author: KEANEN

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with the Canon PowerShot SD3500IS. It takes excellent pictures and amazing videos. In low light situations the imaging stabilizing makes all the difference in the world. The lens cover is a little cheap and occasionally does not close completely the first time you turn the camera off, other than that no problems.
customer_reviews.author: J. P. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Great camera - fast shipping, this is my second (lost the first one)
customer_reviews.text: Happy with it, great price, fast shipping! I guess it 's a good product after all, I bought the same one again due to the fact that I lost the firts one in a bar in Hollywood, what can we say more about that :-) Very good camera, small enough, fast handling, I LIKE IT A LOT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Camper-Chef

customer_reviews.title: Nice but expensive camera
customer_reviews.text: I had a Canon Powershot SD870 and was very happy with it. Unfortunately it fell down and broke the screen liquid crystal, so I decided to buy the SD3500. It is a nice camera, but the only difference from the SD870 is the touch screen. Otherwise the picture quality is about the same. The touch screen does not respond at the first tap. Sometimes you have to tap hardly. I also missed the printed instruction manual that comes with the SD870 in this highly priced camera. It is very complicated to go to your PC every time you need to learn about any camera function. Overall it is a nice camera that I would recommend despite the but high price.
customer_reviews.author: Jose E. M. Cunha

customer_reviews.title: Fast start up, Low noise, Great photos!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this camera to people with children, I have a two year old who does not sit still for photos! Also to "outdoorsy" people, I've gotten great shots of animals and landscapes thanks to the wide screen lens! Touch screen is easy to use. I'm house hunting and my Realtor was impressed with the shots I was getting of the darker rooms, and that was on Auto mode! Awesome camera! Starts up quickly to catch those spur-of-the-moment memories. Takes good quality photos both outdoor and indoors, I had a Nikon before buying this one, BIG difference. The Nikon caught a lot of noise (that white fuzziness in the photos), this one is minimal to obsolete!
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Pollen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I just got the camera today and I can already tell I picked the right one. It was a toss up between the Nikon s8000 and the Canon, and I decided to go with the canon. The touch screen works great (even with a screen protector that I saw someone said not to use in another review). I really like the extra features that are not necessarily important but make picture taking more fun. The camera takes great photos so far, although I haven't really been able to get out and see what all its got. I may update later after having a chance to review it more.
customer_reviews.author: DustBunny

customer_reviews.title: Lots of features in a small package!
customer_reviews.text: We were replacing a canon camera that had gotten dropped in the tub by our 1 year old. (He is so quick). The touch screen takes a little getting used to, but the pictures and video are the high quality that we have come to expect from canon! It suits my need for new, interesting gadgets to play with and learn about and my wife's more practical need for a small camera that can be slipped in a pocket, bag or purse and have on hand when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Denton

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for a very good camera!
customer_reviews.text: This used camera that I recently bought at a teasonable price, replaced the same camera that I used a lot for four plus years, but unfortunately the screen cracked and it became unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Todd Jr

customer_reviews.title: Best camera !
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had purchased this exact same camera after I dropped and busted the display but I went for another Canon but it is no where near the quality and compactness of this one. Truly a great little camera.
customer_reviews.author: Nola

customer_reviews.title: Canon SD3500is
customer_reviews.text: Love the large screen! shoots great movies (in 3 different sizes) Haven't tried the HDMI yet. I droped the camera and the LED screen went pink with lines...(OH NO) Sent to Canon, was back to me in two weeks! I would recomend!
customer_reviews.author: Arctic Man

customer_reviews.title: battery case problem
customer_reviews.text: After only 16 months of use, this camera is broken. There is always showing "change battery" message on screen although the battery is fully charged. (I know it because I have two batteries and both can not be taken by the camera.) I searched the internet and it seems this battery case problem happened on some other canon cameras and models too. Totally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Canon 3500 - Great Camera - Great Experience
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this camera after talking to a friend. No stores in town had it. I went to Amazon and found it as a package and at a very good price. I read reviews, liked what I saw and ordered it on the Monday before Christmas which was coming on Saturday. They promised to deliver by Friday. It arrived on Thursday! It is a very cool camera. Using on auto set is simple. It does have a lot of features and isn't always easy to navigate for technically challenged but I do like the camera very much. I had a great experience ordering for the first time on Amazon. I would not hesitate to use Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimball

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: the touchscreen rocks.. Picture and video quality is great as well.. A very compact and durable camera for sure.. Battery seems ok as well.. I have been using it for a year now and love it!
customer_reviews.author: umair

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: The touch screen is pretty cool, as well as the tap-to-focus feature. But the image quality is just unacceptable. All you will see is those coarse grains everywhere in your photo, even under bright light and lowest ISO settings...It is not worth for that much money. Canon make great SLRs but for card cameras, they don't.
customer_reviews.author: Kamarkaka

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera and have bought about 3 of them for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: jjagb

customer_reviews.title: I have one just like it. Although it is used
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. I have one just like it. Although it is used, I checked it out thoroughly when it arrived and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I had this camera a year or two and it broke. I ordered another one and within one month it broke too. Unfortunately, I had a wedding in which my one year old daughter was a flower girl that weekend, but Canon said they could not get the camera back within one week and did not have a loaner or replacement weekend. Very frustrated when I ordered a nice camera with a large MP to use for special events like this but now I will have to use my phone anyway. I don't plan to order another Canon camera!
customer_reviews.author: CEL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good camera. No regrets,will recommend to people who love taking good pictures. The price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great Canon camera
customer_reviews.text: Had been searching for a new digital camera for several months. A friend had one of these and I was very impressed with the quality of her pictures, love the touch screen and ease of handling. Trying to be a frugal person, I kept checking prices and when Amazon dropped the price on the PINK one, I knew it was mine! Love it! The pictures turn out great - I just have no complaints. I use this camera a lot.
customer_reviews.author: jawgamimi

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible
customer_reviews.text: I have beat up two of these PowerShot models...they really took a beating and they are so good I now have my third one. They last for years!
customer_reviews.author: W. Gittins

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot Sd3500IS
customer_reviews.text: For a small point and shoot camera, this is incredible. I have shot landscape to macro and had nothing turn out bad. The video is beautiful and very easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: weather09

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have had Cannon cameras for years and every one has been great, this SD 3500 is no exception. The best I ever had for low light shots.
customer_reviews.author: Tom V

customer_reviews.title: SD3500 by Canon
customer_reviews.text: Canon never ceases to amaze me with the quality of there products. My wife loves her new toy and takes it everywhere. She never misses a photo opportunity. Her friends are impressed when she is able to review the photos on the large screen and move to the next picture with a simple shake of the wrist or touch of the finger.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harkins

customer_reviews.title: Canon sd3500 great camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is super. Takes outstanding photos. It is very easy to operate. I liked this camera so much I bought another one so now both my wife and I have them
customer_reviews.author: Gerald W. Backhaus

customer_reviews.title: Canon Just Makes Great Cameras
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this camera for my father, he LOVES it!! Never had any issues with all the Canon equip I have, and their image quality is always superior to other brands. GREAT camera, excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I had a bulky kodak. with an almost 2 year old i needed something small with a lot of features. i love this camera. it's portable, has a great selection of features. totally with every penny i spent on it for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie C. Sotelo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, fast, and light
customer_reviews.text: We love this Canon camera. The touch screen makes so many things easier than other cameras. Switching modes, focusing, and reviewing photos all use the same interface.
customer_reviews.author: Shane W. Holloway

customer_reviews.title: My new camera
customer_reviews.text: My new camera is just awesome. I'm just having so much fun with it! I needed a camera to take pictures for my brothers band when I was far away, the zoom on this camera made my day. Plus I just needed a camera for the all around fun. It takes great pictures and it has the best color and sound I've ever had in all my camera's. This camera is the best! Thanks so much for selling it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Dreamingmemory

customer_reviews.title: Perfect point & shoot camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and pic are so vivid each and every time. Highly recommended for those who are looking for a new and great digital camera. The software which comes with the unit is very useful for editing as well. The large screen really makes a whole lot difference in viewing the pic from camera. touch screen? yeah, can't beat that too!
customer_reviews.author: neoncity

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: THIS CAMERA IS COMPACT, ADVANCED, BEAUTIFUL. IT WAS DELIVERED BEFORE THE EXPECTED, AND EVERYTHING LOOKS GOOD. IT IS A PITY THAN NOWADAYS DO NOT INCLUDE WITHIN THE CAMERA NOT EVEN A 2 GB FLASH MEMORY CARD AS USED TO BE. AS A MINIMAL CORTESY, I WOULD SAY.
customer_reviews.author: SER

customer_reviews.title: A good solid camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera though not quite the latest tech is an excellent camera which fits my wife's needs and is simple to use and produces excellent images It also does so in less than ideal lite conditions. It may have been a bit premature for Canon to discontimue this model
customer_reviews.author: Critical Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Mike L.
customer_reviews.text: For a point and shoot camera this has a nice feel and takes great pictures, it is all touch screen and the touch screen works well. Nice camera I would recommend it to a friend if what they were looking for was a point and shoot camera.. Mike
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: I switched from sony dcs-t700 ( also touchscreen) and I'm so happy with my choice,this one takes great pictures in low light and has better image stabilisator
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Amazing point snd shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: Delivery of this product was fast and on time. Camera specs were as advertised. Nice touchscreen, great wide angle and superb image quality. I recommend this camera for point and shoot mode. Light weight and good battery autonomy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the money!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very easy to use and takes great pictures and the price is reasonable. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: L. Herron

customer_reviews.title: touch screen is good, but zoom is very poor (grainy)
customer_reviews.text: This camera has a good touch interface and other basic features like on/off, mode change are good. Only thing that I see isn't good is, zoom in/out when taking snaps or a video.
customer_reviews.author: tanmalhot

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: a little bit slow but i like the camera!! good photos! better than picytures in the cel phone thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sassona Schitz

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera , small enough to travel with it but makes really nice clear pictures , has a touch screen too
customer_reviews.author: abraham malik

customer_reviews.title: GOOD DEAL
customer_reviews.text: VERY HAPPY WITH THIS CAMERA,TAKES VERY DETAILED PHOTO'S AND THE VIDEO IS COOL TOO. THE PRICE FOR WHAT YOU GET IS HARD TO BEAT CAN'T WAIT TO TAKE THIS CAMERA ON A BACK-PACK TRIP, SEE WHAT IT CAN DO IN THE BACK COUNTRY
customer_reviews.author: PAT

customer_reviews.title: Powershot SD3500
customer_reviews.text: Great camera with it's many functions, but pictures aren't as crystal clear on the 3 1/2" touch screen as they were on the screen of my old 2 1/2" SD650. It serves it's purpose well for a quick point and shoot camera.
customer_reviews.author: MacGymnast

customer_reviews.title: Great camera , great price!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, don't read any reviews that critique this digital camera as if it should hold it's own against a professional model. That's just rediculous. This camera makes photography fun with it's clor swap mode, video or photo, and a good variety of effects on video or photo. One drawback I find with the video is there is no way to use fades and wipes between scenes. I must also say the image quality isn't too shabby either . If you want a good, fun, and interesting digi-camera, then this is the one for you, but if you wan't professional results, buy a professional model because you'll only be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: robert drater

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very good camera. Amazing pictures and he video 720p. Good battery live. No complaints at all. Sorry that they stop maiking them.
customer_reviews.author: Plamen Petkov

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's fun and simple to use. Pictures look great indoors and outdoors. Pictures looked grainy in low light conditions but I feel that's the case for such cameras so I'm fine with it.
customer_reviews.author: HY

customer_reviews.title: Price was fair. Got here a day before it ...
customer_reviews.text: Price was fair. Got here a day before it was due. I say it was a 10 all around
customer_reviews.author: Jim O

customer_reviews.title: The image quality isn't what I was expecting for a Canon camera.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it is a quality product. As the title states the only drawback is the image quality isn't up to par with Canon cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Moretz

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Canon cameras are always a wonderful buy. We purchased this camera and used it for a while before moving on to a newer model. The touch screen is a little iffy sometimes. The technology is amazing and continuing to improve.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice Camera and great price!!! The only negative point (for me) is the battery/memory card cover! it is to weak!
customer_reviews.author: Giuseppe Graziano

customer_reviews.title: Best camera ever
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing. I love everything about it. The quality of the pictures and videos are absolutely phenomenal. I love this camera and am very glad that I bought it. It's PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: mikax

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the pics are very clear. Only thing i dont like is that the automatic focus and lightning is not always accurate. Other then that small issue it is a very good camera!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley N

customer_reviews.title: Good results
customer_reviews.text: Timely delivery, well packaged and the product, Cannon Powershot Sd3500IS, was as advertised. I will recommend this retailer to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I use it all the time and make videos, it's very compact and easy to carry. It takes great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy O.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great. I'm really really happy with it! I love how big and bright the touch screen is.
customer_reviews.author: Molly K. Mulligan

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase - It is exactly what the desciption says - I bought this camera becaus the one I had did not perform well in low light - this camera takes great pictures in low light - outside or in - would recommend this anyone looking for a small, powerful camera - Canon got it right with this one!
customer_reviews.author: C. Group

customer_reviews.title: Another great Canon PowerShot SD camera
customer_reviews.text: My wife lost her last Canon SD camera so I bought her this one. It's a great, portable camera.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G.

customer_reviews.title: Cannon 3500IS
customer_reviews.text: The shiping was fast and the camera itself is great. I like it so much also good price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeab Chuen

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot SD3500IS
customer_reviews.text: Great fun little camera. If port covers were like battery cover camera would be near perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Snap Shot

customer_reviews.title: Marginal Color
customer_reviews.text: The colors always seem washed out. Cool screen, but barely acceptable image quality. Looking to get rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: It's about the right size for a handy camera...not bulky! The touch feature is very convenient and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel T. Linzaga

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Slim, light weight, large screen, well packed and shipped with just a little delay. EXCELLENT product! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: pab

customer_reviews.title: Worst Camera Ever.  False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: I hate it. The flash is slow. The pictures are terrible. My blackberry takes better pictures. My last powershot which my son broke (sd750) was so much better. DON'T PURCHASE THIS CAMERA. You will regret it like I did. Thank goodness Amazon took it back. It's not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Nice Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from my sturdy, reliable Canon SD1000. No regrets! The enlarged touchscreen is intuitive and all the bells and whistled perform as advertised. The 5X optical lens is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great camera.. i love the large screen
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera.Loved the features like blink detect, and face detection, detect addition and removal of person from the group... everything is great
customer_reviews.author: LucaniaCap

customer_reviews.title: product good but within a day dropped by 30$
customer_reviews.text: I am sad to see the product price drop by 30$ in a single day sad part i got two of them :-( loss of 60$.
customer_reviews.author: chetan

customer_reviews.title: missing camera
customer_reviews.text: i order this camera and they send me an empty box. it has everything in it but missing camera. i am still waiting for amazon to return my money after one month send it back but they still have not return my money yet.
customer_reviews.author: cover

product_meta.title: Canon PowerShot SD3500IS 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 3.5-Inch Touch Panel LCD and 5x Ultra Wide Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom (Pink)
product_meta.description:
Color:PinkFROM THE MANUFACTURER


 Touch. It's always been the heart of communication. Simply put your finger to the brilliant 3.5-inch wide PureColor System Touch Panel LCD screen, and the versatile excellence of the Canon PowerShot SD3500 IS Digital ELPH is at your command. Naturally, a camera this smart and intuitive knows a few things about style. Color gleams, while smooth curves reveal a definite edge. Touch the future! 

PowerShot SD3500IS Highlights 

Next-generation 3.5-inch LCD with Touch Panel Technology
Just touch your finger to the huge 3.5-inch wide PureColor System LCD screen with Touch Panel Technology and the PowerShot SD3500 IS Digital ELPH responds--creating a fun, natural interface that's just the way you want to interact with technology now. 





In addition, the PowerShot SD3500 IS Digital ELPH provides a natural, tactile method for viewing your photos: With Active Display technology, tapping the camera prompts images to playback, one after the other. Touch the screen when the camera is tilted, and the images will advance. 


14.1-megapixel resolution will generate high quality 16.5 x 23.4-inch prints
With 14.1 megapixels, the PowerShot SD3500 IS Digital ELPH provides amazing image resolution, catching the truly exquisite details that will make your photography top-notch. The PowerShot SD3500 IS Digital ELPH is the very image of photography at its best, featuring megapixels that's among the highest resolution of the Digital ELPH series to capture every detail of the world around you. 

There's never been a better time to think big, knowing that every enlargement will be sharper and more full-of-life than you've ever experienced before. 

24mm ultra wide-angle lens, and 5x optical zoom with Optical Image Stabilizer
Despite its slim profile and small body, the PowerShot SD3500 IS Digital ELPH is equipped with a 5x optical zoom--no more sitting on the sidelines with the action too far away. 


The lens is ultra wide-angle, with a focal length of 24mm. That puts more image in every shot for visual excitement and a high-end feel. And the best part? Even at the long end of the zoom, images are clear and steady thanks to Canon's Optical Image Stabilizer that controls camera shake. 


720p HD movie shooting capability plus HDMI output
The PowerShot SD3500 IS Digital ELPH lets you record video in beautiful high definition (1280 x 720 pixels). The camera also makes it easy to enjoy HD movies (and still photos) on your HDTV with a mini-HDMI connector for direct connection to a high definition TV monitor. 


You'll enjoy the HD experience with no degradation of image or audio in the signal, plus the ability to display up to 130 thumbnails at once. 

Smart AUTO will do the work for you by intelligently selecting from 22 settings
Just set the Canon PowerShot SD3500 IS Digital ELPH to Smart AUTO and you're ready for maximum enjoyment from your picture taking every time. It's a relaxing and satisfying way to shoot because you can completely concentrate on your subject knowing that the camera has the technical details covered. Advanced Canon technology intelligently analyzes your situation and shooting conditions. Then it automatically selects an appropriate setting from specially defined settings. So whether you're photographing flowers, a captivating sunset, or your friends at the park, you can be confident that you're getting dramatic, memorable images. Even if your subject is moving, Canon's advanced detection technologies capture the action as it happens. 

Shooting Modes
Advanced presets for the best possible photos under certain conditions. With 19 Shooting Modes, you're ready for whatever shot comes your way. 

New scene modes such as Miniature Effect and Fisheye Effect
The Canon PowerShot SD3500 IS Digital ELPH offers creative effects similar to those once found only in professional lenses. Miniature Effect creates an illusion where very large objects appear in miniature. Turn soaring cityscapes into a scene in seemingly dollhouse-like proportions. 


Fisheye Effect uses barrel distortion to warp the image around the center, giving a distinctive curvature effect to the photo. The curvilinear images produced by Fisheye Effect can suggest the curve of the Earth, the inside of a dome, or the image you see through the peephole of a door. 

With an ISO of 400-6400, the Low Light mode takes the Canon PowerShot SD3500 IS Digital ELPH where no ELPH-Series has gone before: into the shadows! Now even scenes notorious for having insufficient light, such as those lit by candles, fire, or street lamp, come through in fantastic color and clarity, with less noise. You can keep the feel of the scene intact without adding additional light, so the result will be scenes with the visual accuracy, depth and clarity you expect from a Canon camera. 


New Smart Shutter technology 
Smart Shutter, which includes Smile Self-Timer, Wink Self-timer and Face Detection Self-timer, detects faces in the scene and releases the shutter automatically in response to the appearance of an additional face, or when a smile or sassy wink occurs. These technologies help to make your photography less rushed and more natural, so getting the perfect shot is even easier.

 * Battery Charger CB-2LY 
 * Wrist Strap WS-DC10 
 * Digital Camera Solution CD-ROM 
 * USB Interface Cable IFC-400PCU 
 * AV Cable AVC-DC400
